languages.text: « Pasqal... Sauver la relique et votre mentor peut justifier une infraction mineure au règlement, non ? »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, saving the relic and your mentor justifies a minor infraction of the rules!"

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal... Sauver la relique et votre mentor peut justifier une infraction mineure au règlement, non ? »

languages.text: “帕斯卡，为了拯救圣物和你的导师，稍微违规一下算不了什么！”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, saving the relic and your mentor justifies a minor infraction of the rules!"

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，为了拯救圣物和你的导师，稍微违规一下算不了什么！”

languages.text: 「パスカル、遺物と己の師を救うんだ。少しばかりのルール違反ならば神も許してくれる！」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, saving the relic and your mentor justifies a minor infraction of the rules!"

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、遺物と君の師を救うんだ。ちょっとしたルール違反は神が許してくれるさ！」

languages.text: «¡Pasqal, salvar la reliquia y a su mentor justifica una infracción menor de las normas!».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, saving the relic and your mentor justifies a minor infraction of the rules!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Pasqal, salvar la reliquia y a su mentor justifica una infracción menor de las normas!».

languages.text: "Altı üstü ufak bir kural ihlali Pasqal! Burada yadigârın ve yönderinin emniyeti mevzubahis!"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, saving the relic and your mentor justifies a minor infraction of the rules!"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, yadigârı ve mentorunu kurtarman, riayetsizliğine gölge düşürecek sanma!"
